name: Triple Threat (EntropyRodeo)
description: Dodge the balls to stay alive also go through the energy gates to pick up an attribute which allows you to heal up. The longer you survive the more impossible it gets. Probably goes without saying but stay clear of the spikes as the gravity reverses periodically. A button - nudge left, D button nudge right(on mobile tap on either left or right of screen). May have to click on the browser embedded game when it starts.
